model.daily

Class SingleOrderMngDaily

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.daily.SingleOrderMngDaily
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ManagerDailyInterface

    public class SingleOrderMngDaily
extends java.lang.Object
implements ManagerDailyInterface
    Classe che crea la lista di Single Order e che contiene i metodi per gestirla.
    Author:
    Mauro
